directions.step:
Combine apples with 1/4 c apple juice in a non-corrosive pot. Bring to a boil & simmer 5 minutes. Remove from the heat & let cool. Puree the apples in a food processor or blender.
Combine the pureed apples, syrup, rest of juice, cinnamon & lemon juice. Freeze following the instructions for making Lemon Sorbet.
VARIATION: Calvados Currant Sorbet. Soak 1/4 c dried currants in 1/4 c calvados or applejack for 4 hours or overnight. Drain & add to the sorbet mixture before freezing.
Jim Tarantino, "Sorbets!"
